name: UFM: Unidentified Fantastic Maiden
description:
Unidentified Fantastic Maiden is a mysterious world around the adventure story, in a visual novel presented to you.

Story
Joan Oswin left the magic world and entered into another mysterious space. Where there is a wonderful super powers girl Anny and mechanic Shelrk. And the owner of the space Anne just fled from another world, what she was investigating coincides with Joan Oswin's intention. Joan Oswin defeated Anny and her friends and got their respect.

Joan, who got the new strength, was weak and fainted after winning everyone. She woke up and looked at the investigation records of Anne and her friends, determined her goal, that is hidden in the magic world of her escape the witch leader, she thought it was the culprit of all.

Features
  • 6 selectable roles
  • 6 game story line
  • Unique way of fighting
  • Exquisite role card

Operation method
Mouse control
